title: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru
synopsis: A 9-year-old boy named Wataru Ikusabe is magically transported to a magical realm of the gods called Soukaizan which he is supposed to save. In his quest to save the realm, he manages to transform a clay sculpture into a somewhat autonomous (small) Super Robot.
related_anime: ['Chou Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru', 'Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru: Soukaizan Eiyuu Densetsu', 'Shin Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru Majinzan']
voices: ['Hayashibara, Megumi', 'Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Nishimura, Tomomichi', 'Takano, Urara', 'Genda, Tesshou', 'Yamadera, Kouichi']
staff: [['Iuchi, Shuji', ['Director', ' Script', ' Storyboard', ' Series Composition']], ['Fukuda, Mitsuo', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Koumoto, Shougo', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Kagawa, Yutaka', ['Episode Director', ' Storyboard']]]
